item.title: Decoupling Computation from Data Transformation
item.description: Peter Gabas on Unsplash The Computes Mesh allows for some new ways of delivering applications. Computes helps you take advantage of idle CPU/GPU power you have sitting around in your network. In a traditional API setup, computations and data transformation are linked, usually deployed as an application running on a web server. Computes can help you decouple your computation from your API and provides new opportunities for data transformation.
